name: Lord of Chaos
description:
We live dark times. Apep, the god of darkness, also know as "Lord of Chaos" has cursed the world. It's dark everywhere!

You play as Ra, the mighty adversary of Apep. Your mission is to bright the light back. You accomplish this by lighting up the beacons and banishing the darkness. 

Beware though, Apep lurks in the darkness and manifests itself as a snake trying to kill you. His bite kills you instantly! Luckily though, his tail cannot hurt you. If you spend too much time in the darkness Apep will come after you. Only thing you can do is to try to get into the light!

Can you manage to free the world from the darkness? I dare you...

This is an entry to the UDC Game Jam #21 by the team: MikaKar, RabzZ and PurpleXYZ
